data.text1: Flowers are the most beautiful parts of a plant.
data.text2: Flowers vary in shape, size and colors.
data.text3: But all flowers have the same basic parts.
data.text4: The flower is the reproductive organ of many flowering plants.
data.text5: Some flowers may have only male reproductive parts.
data.text6: Some flowers may have only female reproductive parts.
data.text8: An incomplete flower has either male parts or female parts, but never both. Such as pumpkin flowers.
